content: HIT-Z-R 316 SS Anchor rod Ultimate-performance anchor rod for injectable hybrid anchors (316 stainless steel) ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Anchor rods & elements- - - ### FEATURES:Features Very high loads in cracked concrete and seismic applications in accordance with ICC-ES and ETA C2 approvals No hole cleaning required (above 5°C / 41°F) with HIT-HY 200 Increased productivity and safety by eliminating the hole cleaning process Variable depth of embedment for maximum design flexibility Head marking for easy verification of rod length, even after installation Applications Fastenings in cracked and uncracked concrete in combination with HIT-HY 200 Seismic anchoring applications Anchoring structural steel connections Outdoor applications or fastenings in corrosive environments Anchoring secondary steel structures ### TECHNICAL DATA: Material, corrosion: Stainless Steel, 316 Base materials: Concrete (cracked), Concrete (uncracked) PROFIS Software: Yes Technical Data | Material, corrosion | Stainless Steel, 316 | Base materials | Concrete (cracked), Concrete (uncracked) | PROFIS Software | Yes | Approvals / Test reports | ICC-ES report (concrete) | Cleaning procedures | Non Cleaning | Type of fixing | Pre-fastening, Through-fastening ### ITEMS- 2018454 -
